item.description:
Hi,

Totally last minute change.. One person & guest couldn't make it.. 

If you see this and have time to get to Boston by 10:30 am accepts and then email me at robhill2005@yahoo.com in the next hour (until 9:30 am when I will be leaving my place).. 

I didn't make a max when I first created this which is why I had to go to 11 to open one more spot.

I have a Sonar reserved for this Saturday and the person who I was going to go with can't make it, but I still want to go.

Was planning on leaving via Rowes wharf at 10:30 and sailing to say 1:30 to 2:00. I was going to go to the Boston Beerworks for a few after that.

Hope all is great,

Bobby P
H
item.name: Looking for 1-2 Sonar Sailing this Saturday July 7th
